eye_color_lenses.name: AR Lens Try-On
eye_color_lenses.description: Allow customers to virtually try on different shades of colored contact lenses.
eye_color_lenses.use_case: An essential tool for marketing colored contact lenses from brands like Bausch & Lomb by displaying synthetic eyes in various shades like hazel, blue, and green.

beard_grooming.name: Virtual Beard Stylist
beard_grooming.description: Simulate various beard lengths to showcase the results of grooming serums and oils.
beard_grooming.use_case: Allows brands like Beardo or Ustraa to vary beard length on a synthetic face to simulate grooming progress or different styles, showing the product's effectiveness over time.

anti_aging.name: Age-Defy Skincare Simulator
anti_aging.description: Demonstrate the rejuvenating effects of skincare products by synthetically reversing age.
anti_aging.use_case: For the Skincare sector, this allows brands like Pondâ€™s Age Miracle or Olay to simulate younger-looking skin, providing a powerful before-and-after visual for ad campaigns.

facial_glow.name: Radiance & Glow Simulator
facial_glow.description: Simulate a radiant glow to showcase the effect of brightening moisturizers.
facial_glow.use_case: For beauty brands like Olay or Fair & Lovely, this can show a before/after glow to market the effectiveness of their facial creams and brightening products.

dental_care.name: Smile Whitening Simulation
dental_care.description: Showcase the transformative power of dental products by simulating a brighter, healthier smile.
dental_care.use_case: For the Dental Care industry, this tool can show wider or whiter smiles as a direct result of using products like Colgate, Oral-B, or teeth whitening strips.
